title: Full Stack Developer
description: In my previous role as a software developer, I focused primarily on frontend development but also handled backend tasks. My work involved using JavaScript (Vanilla), PHP, MySQL, CSS, and HTML.
responsibilities: My responsibilities included building websites from scratch based on client specifications, enhancing the company's CRM, and making minor updates to existing pages.

title: Frontend Developer
description: After earning my degree, I spent a few months here learning new skills as a frontend developer.
responsibilities: I assisted in creating a landing page for a burger brand, managed the associated data, and worked on other simple pages as well.

title: Frontend Developer (Internship)
description: During my internship, I gained experience in database management and frontend development using TypeScript.
